compliant.section: Access: You can request more information about the Personal Data we hold about you and request a copy of such Personal Data .
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject

compliant.section: You can also access certain of your Personal Data by choosing to export your data .
Rectification: If you believe that any Personal Data we are holding about you is incorrect or incomplete, you can request that we correct or supplement such data .
You can also correct some of this information directly by editing your Account Settings .
Erasure: You can request that we erase some or all of your Personal Data from our systems .
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

compliant.section: Withdrawal of Consent: If we are processing your Personal Data based on your consent (as indicated at the time of collection of such data), you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time .
Portability: You can ask for a copy of your Personal Data in a machine-readable format .
You can also request that we transmit the data to another controller where technically feasible .
Objection: You can contact us to let us know that you object to the further use or disclosure of your Personal Data for certain purposes, such as for direct marketing purposes .
Restriction of Processing: You can ask us to restrict further processing of your Personal Data .
Right to File Complaint: You have the right to lodge a complaint about IFTTT’s practices with respect to your Personal Data with the supervisory authority of your country or EU Member State .
compliant.legal provisions: Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

non_compliant.section: Please note that in some circumstances, we may not be able to fully comply with your request, such as if it is frivolous or extremely impractical, if it jeopardizes the rights of others, or if it is not required by law, but in those circumstances, we will still respond to notify you of such a decision .
non_compliant.amend: While this statement acknowledges limitations to data subject rights, it does not fully align with the specific conditions and exceptions outlined in the GDPR.  It should be revised to explicitly reference the relevant legal bases for refusal, such as Articles 12(5), 23, and others, and to clarify the specific circumstances in which these limitations would apply.

non_compliant.section: In some cases, we may also need to you to provide us with additional information, which may include Personal Data, if necessary to verify your identity and the nature of your request .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the data subject's rights
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify that any information requested for verification purposes will be used solely for that purpose and will be minimized to what is strictly necessary. It should also clarify the types of additional information that may be required.

non_compliant.section: Please note, however, that if you exercise this right, you may have to then provide express consent on a case-by-case basis for the use or disclosure of certain of your Personal Data, if such use or disclosure is necessary to enable you to utilize some or all of our Service .
non_compliant.amend: Requesting 'express consent on a case-by-case basis' after withdrawal of consent may not always be compliant. The policy should clarify that reliance on consent must be necessary and proportionate for the specific processing activity. If alternative legal bases exist (e.g., legitimate interests), these should be explored and relied upon instead of requiring renewed consent.

non_compliant.section: Transfers of Personal Data: The Service is hosted and operated in the United States (“U . S . ”) through IFTTT and its service providers, and if you do not reside in the U . S . , laws in the U . S . may differ from the laws where you reside .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations
non_compliant.amend: This section needs to be expanded to fully comply with GDPR requirements for international data transfers. It should specify the legal basis for the transfer (e.g., adequacy decision, Standard Contractual Clauses, Binding Corporate Rules), provide details about the safeguards implemented to protect personal data, and inform users about their rights in relation to the transfer.
